title: Full-Stack Personal Website
summary: A responsive MERN stack portfolio site that showcases my projects, technical blog posts, and interactive demos.

description.situation: I needed a central place to show off my projects, skills, and ideas — all built from scratch.
description.task: Design and deploy a modern full-stack portfolio site that’s scalable, interactive, and uniquely mine.
description.action: I used React for the frontend and Node.js/Express with MongoDB for the backend, including custom components and content editors.
description.result: The site serves as my digital playground, resume, and demo portfolio, and it's entirely self-managed and extensible.
